Group Details.Description: APT30is a threat group suspected to be associated with the Chinese government. WhileNaikonshares some characteristics withAPT30, the two groups do not appear to be exact matches.[1][2]

Associated Groups.Name: Phishing: Spearphishing Attachment
Associated Groups.Use: APT30 has used spearphishing emails with malicious DOC attachments.[1]

Associated Groups.Name: User Execution: Malicious File
Associated Groups.Use: APT30 has relied on users to execute malicious file attachments delivered via spearphishing emails.[1]
